maqras.text: haneul-eneun manh-eun cheonsadeul-i iss eudoe geudeul-ui jungjaeneun hananim-i seon taeghan ja-ege geubun-ui heolag-i issneun ihuga anigoneun yuyonghaji moshanola
naeseleul midji anihan jadeul-eun cheonsadeul-eul yeoseong-ila buleuni
geudeul-eun alji mosham-ila geudeul eun eogcheugman-eul ttaleul ppun-ila sillo eogcheug-eun jinlie daehayeo amugeosdo yu hyohaji anhnola
hananim-ui mesejileul oemyeonhaneunja geudaedo geudeul-eul oemyeonhala geudeul eun hyeonseman-eul chuguhal ppun-ila
geugeos-eun geudeul-i algo issneun geos-ila sillo junim-eun geubun-ui gil-eseo beos-eonan jadeul-eul asigo gyesimyeo tto han bog-eum-eul bad-eun geudeuldo algo gyesinila

haneulgwa daejie issneun modeun geos-i hananim an-e iss-eo saagham-eul peotteulineun ja geuui haeng-wie ttala beol-eulnaelil geos-iyo seon-eul silcheonhaneun ja gajang joh-eun geos-eulo bosanghal geos-ila

keun joeaggwa suchiseuleoun haeng-wi leul pihalyeo haneun jaga jag-eun silsu leul hayeoss-eul ttae sillo junim-eun chungbun hi gwan-yong-eul bepusinila hananim-eun heulg-eseo changjohan neohuileul asimyeo tto han neohui eomeoni taenaee iss-eul ttaeuineohuido asinani neohui seuseuloga wanjeonhan geos-ila jeongdanghwa haji malla geubun-eun saag-eulobuteo gyeong-oehaneun jaleul algo gyesinila
oemyeonhaneun jaleul geudaeneun boass neunyo
jogeum jumyeonseo akkawo haneun jala
boiji anhneun geos-e daehan jisig-ilado gajgo iss-eo geuga bol su iss dan mal-inyo
animyeon geuga mose-ui seongseosog e issneun geosdeul-eul alji moshago
myeonglyeong-eul ihaenghan abeulaham e gwanhan iyagido alji moshayeossdan mal-inyo
jimjinjaga daleun salam-ui jim-eul jil su eobs-eumyeo
geuga nolyeoghayeo eod-eun geos oeeneun amu geosdo eobsnola
geuui nolyeog-ui gyeolgwaneun god balghyeojigo
geuneun wanjeonhan bosang-eul badge doeni
choehuui mogjeogjiga geudae junim ila
hananim-eun ingan-eulo hayeogeum usgedo hasigo ulgedo hasimyeo
saengmyeong-eul as-agagido hago saeng myeong-eul jusigido hanila
jaung-eulo namseong-gwa yeoseong-eul chang johasa
bojondoen jeong-aeg-eulo buteola
hananim-eun jeiui changjoleul yag soghasa
buwa gippeum-eul jusineun bun-isi myeo
hananim-eun siliuseu byeol-ui ju nim-isila
hananim-eun himsen yes adeuui baegseong-eul myeolmangke hago
samudeu baegseongdo geuleohge hayeo amugeosdo namji anhge hayeoss-eumyeo
geudeul ijeon-ui saaghago oman haessdeon noaui baegseongdo geuleohge hayeoss nola
hananim-eun los-ui go-euldeuldo jeon bogsikyeo
eungbeolloseo geudeul-eul gamssa beolyeoss eudoe
geulaedo neohuineun junim-ui eunhe e gwanhayeo nonjaenghaneunyo
ineun yes gyeong-gojadeul-e dwiieo on gyeong-gojala
ttaega dagaogo iss-eudoe
hananim oeeneun eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul jejihaji moshalila
geulaedo neohuineun igeos e daehayeo jolonghago issneunyo
usdoe ulji anihago
sigan-eul heosdoei bonaelyeo haneu nyo
hananimkke buboghago geubun man eul gyeongbaehala
simpan-ui nal-i gakkawo omae dal i dullo bunlidoedeola
geudeul-i geu yejeung-eul boassda ha deolado igeos-eun hangsang issneun masul-e bulgwahadago geudeul-eun malhanola
geudeul-eun jinlileul geoyeoghan chae geudeul ui yogmang-eul ttaleul ppun-ila geuleona modeun-il-eun jijeongdoen sigag-e ileunola
imi geudeul-eul gyeong-gohan iyagideul i geudeul-ege ileuleoss-eumyeo
wanseongdoen jihyedo iss-eoss-euna gyeong-go janeun geudeul-ege yuyonghaji moshaessdeola
geudeul-eul meollihala cheonsaga geu deul-eul geudeul-i silh-eohaneun gos-eulo ho chulhalila
geudeul-eun cholahan nundongjalo mudeom-eseo naoni mettugiga heut-eojyeo na oneun geosgwa gatdeola
geudeul-eun cheonsa-egelo dallyeoga oneul-eun neomu eolyeoun nal-ibnida lago malhalila
